message.body: I have a cute neighbor,, and it's driving me crazy... I want him to talk to me again lol,
And he majored in film, you should use your director powers to have him talk to me
lol girl just talk to him.
I don't want to be creepy,,, or awkward you know....
bake something, knock on the door, maybe bring some friends so it looks like you’re all baking something and offer them some and then invite them to hang out. easy peesy.

He added me on Facebook,,,, and messaged invited me and my friends to a triva night but it was during a late class we had.. And then we talked about avatar the last airbender,,, and after a while he didn't message me back.. That was Wednesday,, gosh I'm crazy
lol no, so you’re already in. find a time to reschedule trivia night or another game night dude!
I know, gosh Jenna this is why I need you
For what girl?! you got this in the bag!
Haha to help with my confidence and sanity
You know I always gotchur back! Even if I can’t be there, I’m there in spirit
